scripts.prebuild: node -e "const fs=require(\"fs\");const p=\"src/main.jsx\";const s=fs.readFileSync(p,\"utf8\");const hasCreate=/ReactDOM\\s*\\.\\s*createRoot\\s*\\(/.test(s)||/createRoot\\s*\\(/.test(s);const hasHydrate=/hydrateRoot\\s*\\(/.test(s);const hasLegacy=/ReactDOM\\s*\\.\\s*render\\s*\\(/.test(s);if(s.includes(\"<user__selection>\")){console.error(\"[prebuild] Found stray <user__selection> markers\");process.exit(1);}if(!(hasCreate||hasHydrate||hasLegacy)){console.warn(\"[prebuild] WARNING: no obvious React root API found in\",p);}else{console.log(\"[prebuild] OK (root detected)\");}"
